price: I kada smo dali Musau Knjigu i ono što razdvaja Istinu od neistine, da biste se Pravim putem uputili.
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wal-fur'qāna laʿallakum tahtadūna
